author: Martin, Laurence and Roekhaut, Sophie and Beaufort, Richard
title: Variations prosodiques en synthèse par sélection d'unités: l'exemple des phrases interrogatives (Prosodic variations in unit-based speech synthesis: the example of interrogative sentences) [in French]
booktitle: Proceedings of the Joint Conference JEP-TALN-RECITAL 2012, volume 1: JEP
